TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_waqu', title = waqu', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/waqu'} }

S.FORM: waqu' ( ke' na Plmukan: 蝌蚪 ) hya' ga qutux 'uyuk qpatung. Nanak qpatung qu maki' waqu' nya'.
waqo' ( ke' na Plmokan: 蝌蚪 ) hya' ga qotox 'oyok qpatong. Nanak qpatong qo maki' waqo' nya'.
